title: KarnEvil9 Agent Runtime
description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for the KarnEvil9 deterministic agent runtime

panels.title: Active Sessions
panels.description: Number of currently active sessions

panels.title: Session Rate
panels.description: Rate of new sessions per second (5m window)

panels.title: Total Cost
panels.description: Cumulative cost in USD across all models

panels.title: Total Tokens
panels.description: Cumulative token count across all models

panels.title: Session Rate by Status
panels.description: Rate of sessions broken down by completion status

panels.title: Session Distribution
panels.description: Distribution of sessions by status

panels.title: Step Rate
panels.description: Rate of step executions by status

panels.title: Tool Execution Rate
panels.description: Rate of tool executions by tool name

panels.title: Tool Duration P50 / P95 / P99
panels.description: Tool execution latency percentiles from histogram

panels.title: Token Rate by Model
panels.description: Token consumption rate broken down by model and type (input/output)

panels.title: Cost Accumulation
panels.description: Cumulative cost in USD by model

panels.title: Cost Rate
panels.description: Rate of cost increase per second by model

panels.title: Planner Call Rate
panels.description: Rate of planner invocations by status (success/failure)

panels.title: Planner Duration P50 / P95
panels.description: Planner call latency percentiles from histogram

panels.title: Permission Decisions
panels.description: Rate of permission decisions by type (allow, deny, etc.)

panels.title: Futility Detections
panels.description: Rate of futility detection events (repeated failures triggering halt)

panels.title: Context Budget Verdicts
panels.description: Rate of context budget assessments by verdict (proceed, trim, halt)

panels.title: Limits Exceeded
panels.description: Rate of limit breaches by type (max_duration_ms, max_tokens, max_cost_usd, max_steps, max_iterations)

panels.title: Policy Violations
panels.description: Rate of policy violations by tool name (SSRF, path traversal, command filtering)

panels.title: Plugin Status
panels.description: Current status of all loaded plugins

panels.title: Circuit Breaker State
panels.description: Circuit breaker state per plugin (0=closed, 1=open)

panels.title: Memory
panels.description: Process resident set size (RSS) memory usage

panels.title: CPU
panels.description: Process CPU utilization rate

panels.title: Event Loop Lag
panels.description: Node.js event loop lag in seconds
